feed.title: Category: aging gracefully | Useful Tigress Blog

entry.title: Apparently You Can Do Whatever You Want When You Get Old
entry.content:
Christopher Lee is 91—crikey, I thought he was dead for some reason!—and has apparently decided that that’s a great time to be making metal albums. About Charlemagne!

The first ‘Charlemagne’ album is metal, of course, but what I sang was more symphonic. Now on the second one, ‘The Omens Of Death’, it is one hundred percent heavy metal. I’ve done my bits and pieces, and they are heavy metal. I’m not screaming or anything like that, but it is definitely heavy metal.

Mad respect. I want to hear this now. And to see in person the gloriously cheesy Photoshop work of the cover.
